About Me

Passionate Product Manager advocating for ongoing professional growth.

Google Product Inclusion & Equity Summit

Group Product Case Study proposing accessible Wearable!

Google Product Inclusion & Equity Summit

First group of students to attend PI&E at Google's Headquarters!

Great Minds in STEM Conference

35th Annual GMiS Conference in Pasadena, California!

Anduril's Exclusive Networking/Student Event

1st Campus Tour in Quincy,Massachusetts!

Harvard WeCode Conference

10th Annual Largest Student Led Tech Conference!

With a background in Project Management, I am passionate about driving user-centric solutions through dynamic digital product development. My experience includes strategic coordination, Agile methodologies, and cross-functional collaboration to optimize project execution.

Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science at Kean University, I am expected to graduate in May 2024. Actively involved in academic organizations, I am committed to promoting diversity, inclusion, and equity in technology.

As an advocate for professional development, I was able to attend some events to help with networking, career fairs, resources and more!

October 2023: Google Product Equity & Inclusion Summit at Sunnyvale, California

October 2023: Great Minds in STEM Conference at Pasadena, California

February 2024: Harvard WeCode Conference at Boston, Massachusetts

February 2024:Anduril's Exclusive Networking/Student Event at Quicy, Massachusetts
